active.description: Boolean flag to indicate if the certificate should be active

arn.description: The ARN of the created certificate.

caCertificateId.description: The certificate ID of the CA certificate used to sign the certificate.

caPem.description: The CA certificate for the certificate to be registered. If this is set, the CA needs to be registered with AWS IoT beforehand.

certificatePem.description:
The certificate to be registered. If `ca_pem` is unspecified, review
[RegisterCertificateWithoutCA](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/iot/latest/apireference/API_RegisterCertificateWithoutCA.html).
If `ca_pem` is specified, review
[RegisterCertificate](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/iot/latest/apireference/API_RegisterCertificate.html)
for more information on registering a certificate.

csr.description:
The certificate signing request. Review
[CreateCertificateFromCsr](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/iot/latest/apireference/API_CreateCertificateFromCsr.html)
for more information on generating a certificate from a certificate signing request (CSR).
If none is specified both the certificate and keys will be generated, review [CreateKeysAndCertificate](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/iot/latest/apireference/API_CreateKeysAndCertificate.html)
for more information on generating keys and a certificate.

privateKey.description: When neither CSR nor certificate is provided, the private key.

publicKey.description: When neither CSR nor certificate is provided, the public key.

active.description: Boolean flag to indicate if the certificate should be active

caPem.description: The CA certificate for the certificate to be registered. If this is set, the CA needs to be registered with AWS IoT beforehand.

certificatePem.description:
The certificate to be registered. If `ca_pem` is unspecified, review
[RegisterCertificateWithoutCA](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/iot/latest/apireference/API_RegisterCertificateWithoutCA.html).
If `ca_pem` is specified, review
[RegisterCertificate](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/iot/latest/apireference/API_RegisterCertificate.html)
for more information on registering a certificate.

csr.description:
The certificate signing request. Review
[CreateCertificateFromCsr](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/iot/latest/apireference/API_CreateCertificateFromCsr.html)
for more information on generating a certificate from a certificate signing request (CSR).
If none is specified both the certificate and keys will be generated, review [CreateKeysAndCertificate](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/iot/latest/apireference/API_CreateKeysAndCertificate.html)
for more information on generating keys and a certificate.
